title: Smart Data models - _3gpp-nr-nrm-externalgnbcucpfunction schema
description: Defines the YANG mapping of the ExternalGNBCUCPFunction Information Object Class (IOC), that is part of the NR Network Resource Model (NRM).

ExternalGNBCUCPFunction.description: Represents the properties, known by the management function, of a GNBCUCPFunction managed by another management function.

gNBId.description: Identifies a gNB within a PLMN.

gNBIdLength.description: Indicates the number of bits for encoding the gNB ID.

pLMNId.description: Specifies the PLMN identifier to be used as part of the global RAN node identity.
